about_the_game:
Dive into this rhythm-infused, 4-player co-op hack-and-slash adventure where the chords strike harder than swords! Leave the conventional warriors behind; here, your weapons are musical instruments. Obliterate zombie hordes with electrifying guitar riffs, missile-like drumsticks, ferocious bass swings, and piano turrets that blast foes into oblivion.

As you groove through the apocalypse, collect shimmering Jam Gems to power up your jam meter, readying you to unleash epic performances that decimate the undead! Tear up every highway from LA to Hell across 28 pulse-pounding levels. Are you ready to jam, unleash solos, and save the world from the undead's encore?

Shred The Undead is the debut game from the passionate team at Citizens' Loft Interactive, paying homage to beloved couch co-op adventures. The heart-pounding soundtrack is a masterpiece crafted by the gifted team at Citizens' Loft Records (Ben DeUrso, Ian Brenckle and Kamen Ross).

highlighted.name: We Can Move Faster Than Their Bullets
You're Not Hardcore Unless You Live Hardcore
From Whence You Came You Shall Remain

detailed_description:
Dive into this rhythm-infused, 4-player co-op hack-and-slash adventure where the chords strike harder than swords! Leave the conventional warriors behind; here, your weapons are musical instruments. Obliterate zombie hordes with electrifying guitar riffs, missile-like drumsticks, ferocious bass swings, and piano turrets that blast foes into oblivion.

As you groove through the apocalypse, collect shimmering Jam Gems to power up your jam meter, readying you to unleash epic performances that decimate the undead! Tear up every highway from LA to Hell across 28 pulse-pounding levels. Are you ready to jam, unleash solos, and save the world from the undead's encore?

Shred The Undead is the debut game from the passionate team at Citizens' Loft Interactive, paying homage to beloved couch co-op adventures. The heart-pounding soundtrack is a masterpiece crafted by the gifted team at Citizens' Loft Records (Ben DeUrso, Ian Brenckle and Kamen Ross).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu, CentOS, Fedora
  • Processor: CPU with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL

name: Shred The Undead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct 10

short_description: Chords strike harder than swords in this 4-player co-op adventure. Instead of warriors, elves and wizards, you will be slaying zombies with guitars, drum sticks and piano keys. Travel from LA to Hell in 28 levels.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
